Contact.title: Contact me
Contact.text: How about we have a chat? I’m open to talking and exploring new opportunities. Feel free to reach out to me at ricardoakowalski@gmail.com or through my social media. Let’s connect!

buttons.github: Check out my projects and activities on GitHub
buttons.behance: Check out my visual projects on Behance
buttons.spotify: Let's listen to CSS on Spotify!

box.text: Check out my full profile with experiences, courses, and certifications on LinkedIn, or take a look at my resume.
